After that, a horror-music montage shows humans attacking sea monsters, including a statue fountain slaying one (4). Following this, Luca and Alberto leap from the ocean and transform back into humans midair (5). The wall-painted title “Luca” appears (6), and finally, a “SUMMER 2021” slate appears and the host thanks viewers, asks to like/subscribe, and wishes a magical day (7).
